title: Strengthening App Development Competencies: Workshop on Analyzing Key Factors to Improve Team Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can explain the interaction of four key factors (transformational leadership, team conflict, team cohesion, and psychological safety) that influence team learning outcomes.
Participants can demonstrate the process of deriving successful team learning pathways using surveys and qualitative comparative analysis (QCA).
Participants can develop three action plans to improve their team management approaches based on analytical results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
